description:
An alien relic sought after by religious zealots who don't know what it's capable of. When this deluded quest endangers the world, a government operative with experience is sent in to handle the situation.

"DEAD SPACE - BLACK MARKS" An unofficial dead space short story. Written by Neal Litherland 

https://www.patreon.com/theliterarymercenary
https://vocal.media/fiction/black-marks

Purchase Neals novels on Amazon!

https://www.amazon.com/stores/Neal%20F.%20Litherland/author/B00IKWG338

narrated and produced by A Vox in the Void
All links for socials:

https://linktr.ee/avoxinthevoid

incredible commissioned art by https "hewhodrawsstuff"

https://www.instagram.com/hewhodrawsstuff/

Featuring guest voice actor @ChaoticVoicesofAndreas as Echo

Music by Epidemic sound 

Music used from https://www.FesliyanStudios.com

https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/horror-chase-chapter-2/1706

mysterious suspenseful music

Soundride Studios
